channel.title: Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: AppSource
item.description: Test & Kauf AppSource The app is available in the Microsoft AppSource. After installation, you can use the app in full for 30 days free of charge. If you like the app, you can purchase paid licenses via our order form. Licensing is on a per-user basis, counting each user with a Team Member or Essentials license. Before placing an order, you can find the applicable costs in the price list provided on our website.

item.title: OnPrem
item.description: Test & Kauf OnPrem You have the possibility to test our Connector 365 Custom Filename App without obligation in advance or to purchase it directly. Before ordering, you can find the applicable costs in the price list provided on our website. To order form If you wish a test phase, you will receive the desired objects for a user and a test period of 30 days. Before the end of the test period, we will contact you to take over the purchase or deactivate the test phase.
